tags.name: simple-drawer
tags.description:
`simple-drawer`
`a singleton drawer element`

Events:

  * `resize` {`Event`} - 

  * `simple-drawer-closed` {`CustomEvent<{ opened: boolean; invokedBy: any; }>`} - 

  * `simple-drawer-opened` {`CustomEvent<{ opened: boolean; invokedBy: any; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `invokedBy` - The element that invoked this. This way we can track our way back accessibly

  * `title` {`string`} - heading / label of the modal

  * `align` {`string`} - alignment of the drawer

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - open state

  * `closeLabel` {`string`} - Close label

  * `closeIcon` {`string`} - Close icon

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `invokedBy` - The element that invoked this. This way we can track our way back accessibly

  * `title` {`string`} - heading / label of the modal

  * `align` {`string`} - alignment of the drawer

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - open state

  * `closeLabel` {`string`} - Close label

  * `closeIcon` {`string`} - Close icon

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

attributes.name: invokedBy
attributes.description:
`invokedBy` - The element that invoked this. This way we can track our way back accessibly

Property: invokedBy

attributes.name: title
attributes.description:
`title` {`string`} - heading / label of the modal

Property: title

Default:

attributes.name: align
attributes.description:
`align` {`string`} - alignment of the drawer

Property: align

Default: left

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description:
`opened` {`boolean`} - open state

Property: opened

Default: false

attributes.name: closeLabel
attributes.description:
`closeLabel` {`string`} - Close label

Property: closeLabel

Default: Close

attributes.name: closeIcon
attributes.description:
`closeIcon` {`string`} - Close icon

Property: closeIcon

Default: icons:cancel

attributes.name: accent-color
attributes.description:
`accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

Property: accentColor

Default: grey

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description:
`dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Property: dark

Default: false
